website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the dearth of HD graphics, the Nintendo Wii's combination of motion-sensitive controllers, included Wii Sports titles, and emphasis on fun gameplay make the ultra-affordable console hard to resist.
pros: Revolutionary controller design offers unique motion-sensitive gameplay options
built-in Wi-Fi delivers free online services and gameplay
Virtual Console has major nostalgia appeal
compatible with all GameCube games and controllers
built-in SD slot for storage and photo viewing
latest bundle includes Wii Sports and Wii Sports Resort games, plus MotionPlus attachment
cons: Controller eats batteries and takes some time to get used to
online gaming and community features hobbled by horrible "friends code" system
lacks the advanced HD graphics and surround sound found on the Xbox 360 and the PS3
requires a wired receiver unit placed near the TV to interface with wireless controllers
lacks a steady stream of compelling game releases compared to rival consoles

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Off - Do not purchase anything from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work, the seller had to have known this, and sold it anyway. Specifically: We insert the disc and 7 out of 10 times we get an error message. The other 3 times, having done nothing different - it works and we have enjoyed bowling! This evening after 30-minutes of trying, various error messages, can't read disc and so on - I have given up and come to the conclusion I was duped. Two-hundred dollars wasted. I do not like being ripped off and am posting a warning to not purchase from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. MacBride

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Missing the wires to plug into wall. Was also expecting remote and game as included in description but was incredibly disappointed when I opened the box. The console also had broken hinges on the memory card and GameCube controller slots which made it look like a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Issues
customer_reviews.text: Only one game worked in it and even then that game had issues not sure if the problem was with the console or not.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Gamblain

customer_reviews.title: More than what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: So it said it came with standard Wii system and all cords controller nunchuck and Wii sports. Yes it did. All of it was there I was happy. I looked through them all and I had more than what the list said. I also got another Wii mote nunchuck with sleeves too and chargeable batteries and the charging ports with Wii play. I got hooked up. Thank you mister Jason.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Blowers

customer_reviews.title: Might as well been new!
customer_reviews.text: As clearly stated, nearly new! Everything was wrapped in plastic, couldn't tell if it had ever been used or not! Having a blast playing the sports games that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wii
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect so much marker all over the product. Even tho description stated a photo was have been nice. It is purple and is an eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: Klb334

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. Console was a little dirty (warehouse dust) other than that is was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with several missing parts, console didn't even work, remote had no cover, conole had missing covers. Total mess. Returning. Disappointed kids at home. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: It's a Wii
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. The Wii was in great shape and had all the cords. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: The wii remote dosent come with batteries so if you buy this make sure you get AA batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my wii it came with everything except a steering wheel that's why I'm rating a 4 star but I'm very surprised how good it works, I recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Owen holloway

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from them it's a load of crap. No cords
customer_reviews.text: I got nothing with it except the wii unit. Everything else was left out. Do not buy from them it's a load of crap. No cords, no controller, nothing. How am I supposed to play a game without the cords? Bundles are supposed to include everything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this twice, both times it came incomplete ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice, both times it came incomplete (not all the pieces advertised were included), and the 2nd unit did not work at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: Product is faulty as heatup in less than one hour and stop working, delivered as committed.
customer_reviews.author: Faisal A.

customer_reviews.title: Apparently "good" condition is not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Dirty and not working. It came with Wii Sports, but the disc was so scratched it wouldn't read. A bad buy and disappointed kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything it said it would very nice !
customer_reviews.author: Dejonai

customer_reviews.title: Busted sensor right out of box.
customer_reviews.text: Sensor bar was broken. Remote was responsive but the cursor would not appear or show despite going through nintendo support steps. Edit: Found the problem. Ran my fingers down,the sensor bar's wire and found a bend in the wire where it was frayed. Thanks for that.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get all the stuff that was stated that i was to get
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less then a month
customer_reviews.text: Wii sensor broke after less then a month. I ordered the item on October 11th the sensor broke 9 on November 7th. Company should replace the sensor!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: It is cutting out every 20 minutes while playing and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is cutting out every 20 minutes while playing and has to be restrated and CD included with games not reading because it has a of stratches.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Belgrave

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Please test thing before you send them out. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: kevjen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The system works but the disc that came with it doesn't
customer_reviews.author: DeAngelo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price and very professional!
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked great! The package came the day it was supposed to. All wires were neatly wrapped up and packaged with zip ties. I called the seller to thank him for the good product and he got got back to me within half an hour. All looks brand new. Totally happy with my purchase and will definitely buy from this seller again !
customer_reviews.author: Brett murphy

customer_reviews.title: Right now I am very disappointed with the Wii Console I am having the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Right now I am very disappointed with the Wii Console I am having the same problem tha tI had with the other console and that is why I was replacing it. Someone said it may be my Television so I am going to connect it to the TV in the Den and then I will know for sure whether or not I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: Just as described by the seller. Am using it and its good. Thanks Chad.
customer_reviews.author: Ifyco

customer_reviews.title: Super Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Super Satisfied! Bring on the snow days!! For a used product - you'd never know. We received it sooner than expected. So glad this worked out for us. My kid is sleeping like a champ after a few rounds of Wii boxing. Can we say anything more?? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Corrin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as it should be. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly so far and made a great gift to replace our broken one.
customer_reviews.author: Talk2bethany

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked fine. I especially liked how the previous user left ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly! Everything worked fine. I especially liked how the previous user left their Miis in it, I wasn't expecting Napoleon Dynamite or Jackie Chan but they make an awesome addition.
customer_reviews.author: Citlali

customer_reviews.title: was a great surprise and good touch
customer_reviews.text: The system came with a HelloKitty cover on it, was a great surprise and good touch. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kurth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product and the timely responce to there shipping
customer_reviews.author: Sharie Keeble

customer_reviews.title: Good but slow
customer_reviews.text: A lightning strike near my house killed a few electronic items, including our Wii. This looked like a good price, and I paid the extra shipping so that we wouldn't have to wait too long. Two weeks later... Be patient with this seller. Good product (made by someone else), but sssllllooowww delivery. Don't pay for accelleration.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. Thank you so much. I was afraid I wouldn't be able to use it with my original Nintendo things. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was getting a whole used Wii. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting a whole used Wii. Had to buy a stand. Then had to buy sensor bar....then a power cord......then cord from Wii to TV....thankfully had Wii remotes but now that I bought every part separate on Amazon it does not work. Grrrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: The best thing for your family!
customer_reviews.text: This product came with two games like the description said and works perfectly and fun with playing with your family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nintendo Wii Console White with Wii Sports
product_meta.description: The Wii console brings a revolution of interactive gaming to people of all ages. Wii gaming gets everyone off of the couch for hours of fun! Includes Wii Sports Game, the Wii console bundle comes packed with software and accessories to enhance your Wii experience. Available in white color and comes complete with a matching Wii Remote and Nunchuk.
feature_bullets: Provides an immersive, engaging experience like no other, where the player is more connected to the game than ever before.
Wii Remote: Wii Remote utilizes motion sensor.
Control allowing players to be a part of the game through natural and intuitive movementUse
Wii offers entertainment for every member of the household.
Anyone of any age or skill level can pick up and play games on the Nintendo Wii

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
